Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters relating to knockback.

damage_Min_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for tiny damage hit.

damage_S_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for small damage hit.

damage_M_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for medium damage hit.

damage_L_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for heavy damage hit.

damage_BlowS_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for small blow-off damage hit.

damage_BlowM_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used during the big blow damage hit.

damage_Strike_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for slamming damage hit.

damage_Uppercut_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for launch damage hit.

damage_Push_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for push damage hit.

damage_Breath_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for breath damage hit.

damage_HeadShot_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for headshot damage hit.

guard_S_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for small damage hit when guarding.

guard_L_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for heavy damage hit when guarding.

guard_LL_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for very heavy damage hit when guarding.

guardBrake_ContTime.Wiki: Set the duration of the animation used for guard break hit when guarding.

damage_Min_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for minimal damage hit.

damage_S_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for small damage hit.

damage_M_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for medium damage hit.

damage_L_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for heavy damage hit.

damage_BlowS_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for small blow-off damage hit.

damage_BlowM_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for heavy blow-off damage hit.

damage_Strike_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for strike damage hit.

damage_Uppercut_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for uppercut damage hit.

damage_Push_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for push damage hit.

damage_Breath_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for breath damage hit.

damage_HeadShot_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for headshot damage hit.

guard_S_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for small damage hit when guarding

guard_L_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for heavy damage hit when guarding

guard_LL_DecTime.AltName: Guard Animation: Very Heavy - Stop Delay
guard_LL_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for very heavy damage hit when guarding

guardBrake_DecTime.Wiki: Set the deceleration duration to stop for guard break damage hit when guarding
